title: Drawing, "Female Head in Right Profile on Shoulders"
description: A full head of long, wavy hair frames the left side of the face, covering the ear, but exposing a dangling earring, before falling behind the neck and shoulder. On the right, the hair hangs down, framing the profile outline and then falling behind the shoulder. Under a straight brow, the eyeball is just visible at the inner corner of the eyelid. The full lips are parted; the upper one curves downward.  A choker comprised of abstract curved forms encircles the long neck, and the gently ruffled low neckline emphasizes the bare, curved shoulders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Head in Right Profile on Shoulders".
21.5 x 16.4 cm (8 1/2 x 6 1/2 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-111.
